title: GROM NIS02B3 Bluetooth Hands Free and Music Streaming Car Adapter Kit, Compatible with Select Stereos in Infiniti 02-2011, SAT Emulation
features: Plug and play installation. Control your media from stereo or steering wheel.
Bluetooth Streaming and Handsfree Calls. In hands free mode: accept & reject phone calls, voice dial. Bluetooth Audio streams directly from your phone to the stereo.
GROM-BT3 module has two extension ports that can be used for aux-in, and iPod or iPhone integration with optional cables that are sold separately.
Integrated Bluetooth Car Interface adds Hands Free Calling and Wireless Audio to the original factory stereo of many cars.

Please see compatible cars in Product Description. Note: GROM BT3 adapter for Nissan/Infiniti stereos that are Satellite radio compatible is using satellite radio emulation. Therefore the factory (OEM) satellite radio tuner will need to be physically disconnected in order to be able to use your electronic devices in the car.
description: Altima 2005-2006 (CAT/SAT imprinted on stereo, BOSE only);
Altima 2007-2012 (CAT/SAT imprinted on stereo, no nav, sedan only);
Altima 2008-2013 (CAT/SAT imprinted on stereo, no nav, coupe only);
Versa** 2006-2009 BOSE, with CAT on the stereo;
XTerra** 2007-2010 BOSE, with CAT on the stereo.
** GROM Adapter is only compatible with radios from compatibility list above where word CAT, SAT, or CH, CHANNEL, CATEGORY printed somewhere on the face of the radio.
This is usually located near the Tune or Seek buttons.
